scripts.prepublish:
env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" lsc -cj package.ls &&
env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" lsc -bc bin &&
chmod 755 bin/cmd.js &&
env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" lsc -bc -o lib src
scripts.postinstall:
env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" lsc -cj package.ls &&
env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" lsc -bc bin &&
chmod 755 bin/cmd.js &&
env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" lsc -bc -o lib src
